00020 #include "logreader.h"
00021 #include "laserparser.h"
00022 
00023 using namespace std;
00024 
00025 namespace RDK2 { namespace SensorData {
00026     
00027     void Parser::setParam(const std::string&, const std::string&)
00028     {}
00029     
00030     LogReader::LogReader(istream*is, ostream*os): ls(is), os(os) {
00031         addParser(new LaserParser());
00032     }
00033     
00035     BaseSensorData* LogReader::parse(const std::string&s, std::string *error) {
00036         std::istringstream iss(s);
00037         std::string tag;
00038         if(!(iss>>tag)) {
00039             *error = s+": Could not read tag from string.";
00040             return 0;
00041         }
00042         Tag2Parser::iterator i = parsers.find(tag);
00043         if(i==parsers.end()) {
00044             Unknown * u = new Unknown();
00045             u->tag = tag;
00046             u->line = s;
00047             return u;
00048         }   
00049         return i->second->parse(s, error);
00050     }
00051 
00052     
00053     bool LogReader::write(const BaseSensorData*sd, std::string&line, std::string*error) {
00054         assert(sd);
00055         const Unknown * u = dynamic_cast<const Unknown*>(sd);
00056         if(u) {
00057             line = u->line; 
00058             return true;
00059         }
00060         Tag2Parser::iterator i = parsers.find(sd->tag);
00061         if(i==parsers.end()) {
00062             if(error) {
00063                 *error = string("Could not find parser for tag ")+sd->tag;  
00064             }
00065             return false;
00066         }
00067         return i->second->write(sd, line, error);
00068     }
